Plot: In Manhattan, film-maker Erik bonds with closeted lawyer Paul after a fling. As their relationship becomes one fueled by highs, lows, and dysfunctional patterns, Erik struggles to negotiate his own boundaries while being true to himself.
Title: Keep the Lights On
Actors: Thure Lindhardt, Zachary Booth, Marilyn Neimark, Paprika Steen
tomatoConsensus: Keep the Lights On is a mysterious, sexy journey deep into the love affair of two men that always manages to stay true to life.
